nodes.text: Too late. It's already been done. One thing I learned a while back is that a conservative will rarely, if ever, post anything that is contrary to his or her beliefs and the same can be said for the liberal. Both sides take every advantage to post something favorable to their ideologies. There is no such thing as being unbiased when it comes to putting out the info. People in glass houses should not throw rocks. No side of the aisle is above this tactic. Including my own. Don't believe anything you hear or read and only half of the stuff you actually see for yourself.

and thus a reason to support balanced reporting. true, there are indisputable facts. say 3000 died. but the interpretation of the facts are subjected to bias. the 3000 deserved to die as collaborators vs the 3000 were innocent and did not deserve to die.
